notamdrec.notam_text: F1010/24 NOTAMN Q) LFXX/QCDLT/I /BO /E /150/999/4443N00108E999 A) LFBB LFEE LFFF LFMM LFRR B) 2407110734 C) PERM E) FOR OVERFLIGHTS OR ARRIVALS, LOGON MUST BE INITIATED BY THE PILOT, WITH SUFFICIENT NOTICE (BETWEEN 10 AND 25 MINUTES BEFORE ENTERING THE CRNA), TO ENSURE THAT THE CONNECTION IS ESTABLISHED, AND WITH THE FIRST FRENCH ACC CROSSED. IF LOGON HAS ALREADY BEEN ESTABLISHED WITH AN ADJACENT UPSTREAM ACC PROVIDING LOGON FORWARD, OR IF FORWARD HAS FAILED, ADVANCE NOTICE IS NOT REQUIRED. FOR FLIGHTS DEPARTING FROM FRENCH AIRFIELDS, LOGON MUST BE INITIATED NO LATER THAN CROSSING FL150. IF LOGON IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR A TECHNICAL REASON KNOWN OR UNKNOWN TO THE E PILOT, THE CREW WILL ANNOUNCE 'UNABLE CPDLC'. REFERENCE AIP FRANCE GEN 3.4-9.
